alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 17 at 2:20AM MDT until August 18 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 10 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 100 degrees expected Today and Friday. Tonights lows only in the middle 60s to lower 70s. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to Midnight MDT tonight. For the second Heat Advisory, from 9 AM to 10 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, take frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
